name: AFGPipeBuilderTrail
comment: Copyright 2016-2019 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: AFGPipeBuilderTrail
methods.comment: Sets default values for this actor's properties

methods.name: AddPipeline
methods.comment: Adds a pipeline that the trail should traverse

methods.name: StartSplineMovement
methods.comment: Stars moving if we have any pipes to traverse

methods.name: EffectDone
methods.comment: Called when one build effect has completed

methods.name: BeginPlay
methods.comment: Called when the game starts or when spawned

properties.name: mPipesToTraverse
properties.comment: Saved pipelines we have to traverse

properties.name: mMaxSplineDistance
properties.comment: Max distance of current spline being traversed

properties.name: mSpeed
properties.comment: How long it should take for trail to complete the spline movement in seconds

properties.name: mDoSplineMovement
properties.comment: Indicates if we are currently moving along a spline
